segment.name: Beginning of message
segment.documentation: BGM, A segment uniquely identifying the type of document (e.g. certificate of origin, export licence, application for licence), its function and the document reference number.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment identifying dates relevant to the document specified in the above BGM (e.g. date of issue, the validity period, the date on which licence is available for inspection, the date goods are available for inspection, the authentication date, time of the document).

segment.name: Status
segment.documentation: STS, A segment specifying status information relevant to the entire message (e.g. the status of a request or operational process relating to the certificate, permit, etc.).

segment.name: Place/location identification
segment.documentation: LOC, A segment identifying a location relevant to the entire message (e.g. country of origin, country of ultimate destination, country of destination, present location of goods, identification of transit countries, country of export, region of export).

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, A segment identifying references related to the entire message (e.g. Customs declaration number, exporters textile control registration number, form A reference number, certificate number, slaughter plant licence number, processing plant licence number).

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, A segment specifying textual information in code or clear form, to give further clarification where required to the entire message (e.g. special comments, certification statements, goods description).

segment.name: Measurements
segment.documentation: MEA, A segment identifying measurements relevant to the products covered by the entire message (e.g. net weights of goods, quantity of goods, quantity covered by quota).

segment.name: Monetary amount
segment.documentation: MOA, A segment identifying monetary amounts related to the whole message (e.g. invoice value, special handling charges, transport charges, customs value).

segment.name: Processing information
segment.documentation: GEI, A segment identifying how processing of the message is to be qualified.

segment.name: Customs status of goods
segment.documentation: CST, A segment identifying the Commodity code which relates to the whole message.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 1: A group of segments identifying documentary requirements where they are needed as supporting information for the entire message.

segment.name: Document/message details
segment.documentation: DOC, A segment identifying a specific document required as supporting information for the entire message.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment identifying a date related to the document specified in the above DOC (e.g. date of issue of the document or the presentation period within which the document must be presented).

segment.name: Place/location identification
segment.documentation: LOC, A segment identifying locations related to a document (e.g. the place of issue of document identified in the above DOC).

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 2: A group of segments identifying parties relevant to the entire certificate, with any related contacts and communication numbers.

segment.name: Party identification
segment.documentation: PNA, A segment identifying the name or other references of a party associated with the message (e.g. importer, consignor, consignee, exporter, applicant, transport company, manufacturer, company to which product is to be transferred, certificate issuing authority, authenticating party).

segment.name: Address
segment.documentation: ADR, A segment identifying the address of a party associated with the message (e.g. importer, consignor, consignee, exporter, applicant, transport company, manufacturer, company to which product is to be transferred, certificate issuing authority, authenticating party).

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 3: A group of segments identifying a contact and communication numbers for the party specified in the above PNA.

segment.name: Contact information
segment.documentation: CTA, A segment giving additional contact information for the person or department specified as a relevant party, to whom communication should be directed.

segment.name: Communication contact
segment.documentation: COM, A segment identifying the phone number, fax number or other communications number of the contact specified for the relevant party.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 4: A group of segments specifying how products described on the message are transported, possibly in multiple stages.

segment.name: Transport information
segment.documentation: TDT, A segment identifying the mode and means of transport, and the transport vehicle used (e.g. vessel voyage number or aircraft flight number, vessel or aircraft name, vessel or aircraft registration number).

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment identifying a date related to the transport of product (e.g. date of departure and date of arrival of each transport stage).

segment.name: Place/location identification
segment.documentation: LOC, A segment identifying a location relevant to a transport stage.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, A segment identifying an additional document or regulatory references relevant to a transport stage.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 5: A group of segments specifying the number, characteristics, and identification markings of packaging relevant to the entire message.

segment.name: Package
segment.documentation: PAC, A segment identifying the number and type of packages relevant to the entire message.

segment.name: Package identification
segment.documentation: PCI, A segment identifying markings and labels on packages relevant to the entire message.

segment.name: Measurements
segment.documentation: MEA, A segment identifying measurements relevant to packaging of the product covered by the entire message (e.g. weights of inner and outer packages).

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 6: A group of segments identifying equipment used to transport of product covered by the entire message.

segment.name: Equipment details
segment.documentation: EQD, A segment identifying a unit of equipment used to transport the product covered by the entire message (e.g. container or ships hold).

segment.name: Temperature
segment.documentation: TMP, A segment to identify temperature details related to the equipment unit specified in EQD.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 7: A group of segments identifying seals applied a unit of equipment used to transport the product covered by the entire message.

segment.name: Seal number
segment.documentation: SEL, A segment identifying a seal and the seal issuer for the unit of equipment.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment identifying a date relevant to the sealing of the unit of equipment.

segment.name: Place/location identification
segment.documentation: LOC, A segment identifying a location relevant to the sealing of the unit of equipment (e.g. place where seal applied).

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 8: A group of segments identifying a process applied to the product, packaging or transport equipment covered by the entire message, and related names, addresses, dates, measurements, references, processing indicators and textual information.

segment.name: Process identification
segment.documentation: PRC, A segment identifying a process relevant to the entire message (e.g. pest treatment, slaughtering, packing, storage, testing, preservation and materials such as chemicals associated with the process).

segment.name: Item description
segment.documentation: IMD, A segment used to indicate chemicals, active ingredients etc. used in processing.

segment.name: Measurements
segment.documentation: MEA, A segment identifying various measurement factors for the process (e.g. temperature during storage or chemical concentrations during treatment).

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment identifying a date and or time relevant to the process (e.g. duration of a specific process).

segment.name: Place/location identification
segment.documentation: LOC, A segment identifying a location relevant to the process.

segment.name: Document/message details
segment.documentation: DOC, A segment identifying a specific document required as supporting information for the process.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, A segment identifying an additional reference or regulation relevant to the process.

segment.name: Temperature
segment.documentation: TMP, A segment to identify temperature details related to the process.

segment.name: Processing information
segment.documentation: GEI, A segment to specify processing indicators related to the process.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, A segment to specify textual information in code or clear form, related to the process.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 9: A group of segments identifying a party relevant to a process applied to all product, packaging or transport equipment covered by the entire message, together with any related addresses, contacts and communication numbers.

segment.name: Party identification
segment.documentation: PNA, A segment identifying the name or other reference to a party associated with a process applied to product or associated equipment (e.g. the identifier of a treatment, packing, storage, inspection or testing organisation).

segment.name: Address
segment.documentation: ADR, A segment identifying the address of a party associated with a process applied to a product or associated equipment (e.g. the address of a treatment, packing, storage, inspection or testing organisation).

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 10: A group of segments identifying contact and communication numbers for the party specified in the above PNA.

segment.name: Contact information
segment.documentation: CTA, A segment giving additional contact information for the person or department specified as a relevant party, to whom communication should be directed.

segment.name: Communication contact
segment.documentation: COM, A segment identifying the phone number, fax number or other communications number of the contact specified as relevant party.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 11: QTY-MOA-SG12-SG13-SG15-SG16-SG18 A group of segments identifying line item details for a certificate, permit, authorization, etc.

segment.name: Line item
segment.documentation: LIN, A segment identifying product item details for a line on the message.

segment.name: Customs status of goods
segment.documentation: CST, A segment identifying the Commodity code at item level.

segment.name: Measurements
segment.documentation: MEA, A segment identifying measurements relevant to the product item (e.g. net and gross weights, number of items or age).

segment.name: Additional product id
segment.documentation: PIA, A segment specifying additional or substitutional product item identifiers. The segment should be used for example to specify any tariff classification relevant to the product item.

segment.name: Item description
segment.documentation: IMD, A segment describing the product item in an industry or free format. The segment could also be used to describe attributes such as species or breed.

segment.name: Goods identity number
segment.documentation: GIN, A segment specifying additional identifiers related to the product item (e.g. animal tag numbers).

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, A segment identifying references related to the product item (e.g. quota reference number, export authorization number, permit holder reference number, product serial number).

segment.name: Attribute
segment.documentation: ATT, A segment further identifying attributes of the product item (e.g. product sex).

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment identifying a date relevant to the product item (e.g. the use by date).

segment.name: Place/location identification
segment.documentation: LOC, A segment identifying a location relevant to the product item (e.g. country of origin where different to country of export).

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, A segment specifying textual information in code or clear form, to give further clarification where required for the product item (e.g. scientific name of the product item, any declarations or comments specific to the product item, and the names of product contaminates).

segment.name: Quantity
segment.documentation: QTY, A segment identifying quantity details relevant to the product item (e.g. quantity manufactured, quantity in commercial units, quantity in control units, quantity in quota units, quantity shipped).

segment.name: Monetary amount
segment.documentation: MOA, A segment identifying monetary amounts related to the product item (e.g. customs value, item price).

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 12: A group of segments identifying related documents specific to a licence, certificate, permit, etc. line.

segment.name: Document/message details
segment.documentation: DOC, A segment identifying a specific document required as supporting information for a certificate, permit, authorization line.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment identifying a date related to the document (e.g. date of issue of the document, the presentation period within which the document must be presented).

segment.name: Place/location identification
segment.documentation: LOC, A segment identifying a location related to the document (e.g. place of issue of the document).

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 13: A group of segments identifying a party relevant to a line item, together with any related addresses, contacts and communication numbers.

segment.name: Party identification
segment.documentation: PNA, A segment identifying the name or other reference to a party relevant to a line item.

segment.name: Address
segment.documentation: ADR, A segment identifying the address of a party relevant to a line item.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 14: A group of segments identifying contact and communication numbers for the party specified in the above PNA.

segment.name: Contact information
segment.documentation: CTA, A segment giving additional contact information for the person or department specified as a relevant party to whom communication should be directed.

segment.name: Communication contact
segment.documentation: COM, A segment identifying the phone number, fax number or other communications number of the contact specified as the relevant party.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 15: A group of segments specifying the number, characteristics, and identification markings of individual packages.

segment.name: Package
segment.documentation: PAC, A segment identifying the number and type of packages relevant to the product item.

segment.name: Package identification
segment.documentation: PCI, A segment identifying markings and labels on packages relevant to the product item.

segment.name: Measurements
segment.documentation: MEA, A segment identifying measurements relevant to packaging of the product item (e.g. weights of inner and outer packages).

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 16: A group of segments identifying equipment used to transport the product item.

segment.name: Equipment details
segment.documentation: EQD, A segment identifying a unit of equipment used to transport the product item (e.g. container or ships hold).

segment.name: Temperature
segment.documentation: TMP, A segment to identify temperature details related to the equipment.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 17: A group of segments identifying seals applied a unit of equipment used to transport the product item.

segment.name: Seal number
segment.documentation: SEL, A segment identifying a seal and the seal issuer for the unit of equipment.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment identifying a date relevant to the sealing of the unit of equipment.

segment.name: Place/location identification
segment.documentation: LOC, A segment identifying a location relevant to the sealing of the unit of equipment.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 18: SG19 A group of segments identifying a process applied to a product item, and related names, addresses, dates, measurements, references, processing indicators and textual information.

segment.name: Process identification
segment.documentation: PRC, A segment identifying a process relevant to the product item (e.g. pest treatment, slaughtering, packing, storage, testing, reservation and materials such as chemicals associated with the process).

segment.name: Item description
segment.documentation: IMD, A segment used to indicate chemicals, active ingredients etc. used in processing.

segment.name: Measurements
segment.documentation: MEA, A segment identifying various measurement factors for the process.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment identifying a date relevant to the process (e.g. duration of a specific process).

segment.name: Place/location identification
segment.documentation: LOC, A segment identifying a location relevant to the process.

segment.name: Document/message details
segment.documentation: DOC, A segment identifying a specific document required as supporting information for the process.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, A segment identifying an additional reference or regulation relevant to the process.

segment.name: Temperature
segment.documentation: TMP, A segment to identify temperature details related to the process.

segment.name: Processing information
segment.documentation: GEI, A segment to specify processing indicators related to the process.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, A segment to specify textual information in code or clear form, related to the process.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 19: A group of segments identifying a party relevant to a product item process, together with any related addresses, contacts and communication numbers.

segment.name: Party identification
segment.documentation: PNA, A segment identifying the name or other reference to a party relevant to a product item process.

segment.name: Address
segment.documentation: ADR, A segment identifying the address of a party relevant to a product item process.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 20: A group of segments identifying contact and communication numbers for the party specified in the above PNA.

segment.name: Contact information
segment.documentation: CTA, A segment giving additional contact information for the person or department specified as a relevant party to whom communication should be directed.

segment.name: Communication contact
segment.documentation: COM, A segment identifying the phone number, fax number or other communication number of the contact specified as the relevant party.

segment.name: Control total
segment.documentation: CNT, A segment to provide message control totals as required (e.g. total number of line items, total number of containers, total quantity shipped).

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 21: A group of segments permitting the verification of the authenticity of the sender and the integrity of the data.

segment.name: Authentication result
segment.documentation: AUT, A segment containing the result of the algorithm permitting the verification of the authenticity of the sender and the integrity of the data.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment identifying a date associated with the preceding AUT.
